      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sliding friction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schieben von von Friktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Glissement du frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deslizando a fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare scorrere attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριβή ολίσθησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resbalar la fricción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the sliding motion of a book on a smooth table top (small friction) and on a rough carpet (large friction).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carpet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Slide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sliding friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">table</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die gleitende Bewegung
eines Buches auf eine glatte Tabelle Oberseite (kleine Friktion) und 
auf einem rauhen Teppich (große Friktion).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare le mouvement 
coulissant d'un livre sur un dessus de table doux (petit frottement) 
et sur un tapis rugueux (grand frottement).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara o movimento deslizante 
de um livro em um alto de tabela liso (fricção pequena) e em um 
tapete áspero (fricção grande).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta il movimento 
scorrevole di un libro su un piano d'appoggio regolare (piccolo 
attrito) e su una moquette di massima (grande attrito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει τη γλιστρώντας κίνηση 
ενός βιβλίου σε μια ομαλή επιτραπέζια κορυφή (μικρή τριβή) και 
σε έναν τραχύ τάπητα (μεγάλη τριβή).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara el movimiento que 
resbala de un libro en una tapa de vector lisa (fricción pequeña) y 
en una alfombra áspera (fricción grande).</string>
          </description>
